message.content:
Great, here's a fitness plan for you based on the information you provided:

<start>

Day 1 - Session #1
Warm-up: 5-minute light jog
Exercises and intervals: Bodyweight squats (3 sets x 10 reps); Push-Ups (3 sets x 10 reps); Plank (3 sets x 30 seconds)
Cooldown: 5-minute walk
Estimated workout time: 35 minutes

Day 2 - Session #2
Warm-up: 5-minute walk
Exercises and intervals: Walking lunges (3 sets x 10 reps each leg); Dumbbell rows (3 sets x 10 reps each arm); Dumbbell bench press (3 sets x 10 reps); Jumping jacks (3 sets x 30 seconds)
Cooldown: 5-minute walk
Estimated workout time: 35 minutes

Day 3 - Session #3
Warm-up: 5-minute light jog
Exercises and intervals: Resistance band curls (3 sets x 10 reps each arm); Resistance band tricep extensions (3 sets x 10 reps each arm); Jogging intervals (10 minutes at a moderate pace, followed by 5 one-minute sprints)
Cooldown: 5-minute walk
Estimated workout time: 45 minutes

Day 4 - Session #4
Warm-up: 5-minute walk
Exercises and intervals: Seated leg press machine (3 sets x 10 reps); Pull-down machine (3 sets x 10 reps); Leg curls machine (3 sets x 10 reps); Bicep curls with resistance band (3 sets x 10 reps)
Cooldown: 5-minute walk
Estimated workout time: 40 minutes

Day 5 - Session #5
Warm-up: 5-minute light jog
Exercises and intervals: 5-minute jog, followed by 10 bodyweight squats, 10 push-ups, and a 30-second plank (repeat this sequence for 25 minutes)
Cooldown: 5-minute walk
Estimated workout time: 35 minutes

Day 6 - Session #6
Warm-up: 5-minute walk
Exercises and intervals: Treadmill running intervals (2 minutes at a moderate pace, followed by 1 minute at a sprint pace; repeat for 20 minutes); Resistance band rows (3 sets x 10 reps)
Cooldown: 5-minute walk
Estimated workout time: 30 minutes

Day 7 - Off day

Remember to always listen to your body and adjust the intensity or frequency of the workouts if needed. Also, make sure to consult with a medical professional before starting any new exercise regime. Keep up the great work! 

<stop>

chatHistory.content: Act as a helpful and motivating fitness coach. Help me to create a fitness plan for me based on the profile I provide. Please be concise and use simple language, if the I provides a structured way of displaying information please respect use only that structure and no more words. Your first reply is "Hi", one word.
Hi! I'd be happy to help you create a customized fitness plan. Can you provide me some information about yourself?

My sex is male, I weight 70 kg and I am 170 cm tall, I am 33 years old, I usually sleep around 7 - 8 hours hours per night Here are my goals: loose weight, gain muscle. Here is my workout duration: 30 min - 1 hour. Here is my workout complexity: easy. Here is my workout frequency: daily. I want my fitness plan to include the following exercises: strength, running. Please consider that I have the following injuries: ligament, bone.")
